home.title: Crafted with Passion
home.description: Hi, I'm Frida, a knitter and crafter. Every stitch, every thread, and every detail is infused with love and dedication. Where traditional craftsmanship meets contemporary imagination.

intro.part1: Hi ğŸ‘‹ I'm Frida, a passionate crafter dedicated to creating unique handmade pieces that bring joy and beauty to everyday life.
intro.part2: With over 5 years of experience in various crafting techniquesğŸ§¶, I specialize in creating handmade items that combine traditional methods with contemporary designs.
intro.part3: My journey in the world of crafts began when I discovered the therapeutic nature of creating something beautiful with my own hands. Since then, I've been exploring different techniques and materials, always striving to bring unique pieces to life.
intro.part4: Also, I'm a kindergarten teacher ğŸ‘©ğŸ»â€ğŸ«. I love working with kids and helping them explore the world through art. With the skills of crafting, I'm able to teach themğŸ§’ more about the world, and let them grow up with creativity and happiness. ğŸ’–

philosophy.title: My Crafting Philosophy
philosophy.description: I believe that handmade items carry a special energy - they're not just products, but pieces of art that tell a story. Each item I create is made with attention to detail and love for the craft.
